book.synopsis: In the Carolinas of 1699, a traveling magistrate and his clerk, Matthew, arrive in Fount Royal to hold a trial for an accused witch, a beautiful young woman named Rachel Howarth, a trial that reveals that Fount Royal has become a battleground between good and evil and that not even the innocent are safe.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.25 Inches, Length: 6.25 Inches, Weight: 2.75 Pounds, Width: 2.25 Inches
